_header: I heard a maiden weep / For her sons passion
_description: A song of the Hours of the Cross — fourteen quatrains (abab)

CULEe112.First Lines: I hard a maydyn wepeffor here sonnys passyon…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…hys passion kynd tohaue in myndeAs yt was euer more hys
                    wylle
CULEe112.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 136-8.
